task.title: Posting a Prose.io Response
task.shortdesc: How to post a prose.io response to GitHub

context.p: This task will allow you to write a Markdown post on GitHub using Prose.io.

step.cmd: Login to Github with your account.
Select the desired repository and location for your post.
Click on the green box that says “new file”.
Select filename path from top of page and provide a filename.
Click disk icon on right side of page. Describe the changes you made in the box that appears. Hit commit to save your post.
